text: @ShashiTharoor @AmitShah With 73466 deaths for a population of 130 crore it is 0.00057% deaths . New Zealand  which is the first Nation to declare Covid19 free ratio is 0.00044% deaths . We are better off than Many of the developed Nations in Covid19 fights and death control. KIUP Modi Govt 🙏 @BJP4India

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
